segments.text: You must be Mr.Sellers . I'm Steven . I am here to see the apartment you advertised .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , nice to see you . The apartment is on the tenth floor . The previous tenant just moved out yesterday .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Could I have a look at it first ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . Let me show you the way . Here we are . Apartment 1008 . ( They enter . ) This is the living room dining room combination . Here's the kitchen . It's small , but fully equipped . The refrigerator is new , and the stove and the microwave oven are less than a year old .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's nice . So this is the bathroom . And that must be the bedroom .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . And there's a walk-in closet .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , there's central air conditioning and heating . The thermostat is in the living room ã€‚
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What's the house rent ? When is the rent due ? And how much security deposit do you require ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's 600 yuan per month.The rent is due no later than the tenth of the month . We ask that you leave a month's rent as a deposit . It will be returned to you at the end of your lease .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I like the apartment , Mr.Sellers . You can show me the lease .
segments.speaker: S1
